content.en: Automated CMM Inspection: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms in coordinate measuring machines (CMMs) to automate the inspection of mechanical parts and analyze measurement data. These algorithms are compared and benchmarked to determine the most suitable form-fitting algorithm for CMMs. Additionally, new computational algorithms are proposed to improve the evaluation of circularity and to verify conformance to tolerance zones in dimensional measurement data analysis.
content.da: Automatiseret CMM-inspektion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i koordinatmålemaskiner (CMM'er) for at automatisere inspektionen af mekaniske dele og analysere måledata. Disse algoritmer sammenlignes og benchmarkes for at bestemme den mest passende formtilpasningsalgoritme for CMM'er. Derudover foreslås nye beregningsalgoritmer for at forbedre evalueringen af rundhed og for at bekræfte overholdelse af toleranzoner i måledataanalyse.
